promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute mythical lizard dark-type pokemon holding a violet hypnotic bow. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Lavendrake, a a chibi cute mythical lizard dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Edge, Ticking Knock Out. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "dark" or "Lavendrake". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, lizard-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: This enigmatic creature, often spotted in fortress-like terrains, uses Dark Edge to blend with shadows. Known for its Ticking Knock Out, it's loved for its charming, miniature form.
